document_data.name: Moog
document_data.mainbody: '''Moog''' was a lonely [[hill giant]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.Activities: Moog lived in a decrepit old tower somewhere near the [[Dessarin Valley]] where she wallowed in self-pity.
document_data.History: In the late 1480s or early 1490s DR, Chief [[Guh]] took Moog's husband, [[Hruk]] as her own, like many others. This event destroyed Moog.
